alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 12:42PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Union, Pulaski, eastern Alexander, eastern Fulton, Carlisle, Hickman, Ballard and eastern Mississippi Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1141 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ware to Tamms to near Hickman. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mounds, Tamms and Ware around 1145 AM CDT. Jonesboro around 1150 AM CDT. Anna around 1155 AM CDT. Cobden and Dongola around 1200 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fulgham and Karnak. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 39. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 18 and 21. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
